name: Invasion (itch) (DannyBrez)
description:
This game is a work in progress using a tutorial to learn Unreal Engine 5 and its blueprint system.

The completed tutorial can be found on GameDev.tv here: https://www.gamedev.tv/p/unreal-engine-5-blueprints

Invasion is my take on a wave based FPS game in which the player has to eliminate all enemies within the level. As this is a work in progress, only one level is currently created to showcase the games basic features. More features are planned for future releases which can be seen below. 

Controls

- Movement: WASD

- Fire: Left Click

- Aim: Right Click

- Jump: Spacebar

Objective

Destroy all remaining Drones within the level to win. You have 3 minutes to do this. Make sure to maintain your Ammo and Health with pickups around the level. 

Additional Features for the Future

  • Main Menu
  • Multiple Levels
  • Different Enemies
  • Different Weapons
  • Endless Game Mode (Consistent Waves of Enemies)
  • Difficulty Levels
